career.title: Bachelor in Software Development - UTN
career.description: In 2018, I started my career driven by my curiosity for computing. During that time, I acquired basic knowledge in C, as well as JavaScript and programming logic. In 2019, I got my first job in the field and, because of that, I decided to put my career on hold..

career.title: Bachelor in Software Development - UTN
career.description: In 2023, I felt the need to resume my studies, so I decided to return to academic training. Currently, I am pursuing a bachelor degree with the aim of completing it by the end of 2024..

exp.title: TLC Innovation
exp.description: I started my career as a Backend Trainee, specializing in development with .NET and C#. My work focused on integrating SQL queries and updates using ADO.NET. I worked closely with various teams on projects for major clients in the logistics and commercial sector, developing industrial applications for internal use. By the end of my time as Backend Jr+, I had accumulated significant experience in a variety of projects, including the integration of REST and SOAP APIs, as well as the implementation of SAP in .NET environments..

exp.title: NTT Data
exp.description: Since August 2021, I have been working as a FullStack Jr/Ssr, specializing in .NET Core for the backend and React for the frontend, with the recent addition of Angular. I have collaborated on projects for global clients in the industrial sector, working directly with clients and in conjunction with other consultancies. Throughout this time, I have adopted best practices and standards such as Azure DevOps for deployments, Git for version control, and CI/CD methodologies, as well as agile methods. Currently, I am focused on honing my technical knowledge, as well as developing my soft and leadership skills..
